title: @ Riot New Skin Idea Surprise Party Nocturn!
body:
Ok here me out peeps. So I was messing around with surprise party fiddle sticks and had the best skin idea ever.

Riot needs to make a surprise party Nocturn !!! when you ulty instead of just Darkness Balloons and streamers fall !!! 

'Q'  can be a roll of party table cloth. 
'W' can be a transparent balloon  bubble 
'E' Could be two streamers  flailing about and when the fear pops a small amount of confetti comes out from the target.
'R' Where no vision is present balloons streamers and confetti fall. 

What do you guys think, I think this needs to happen yesterday.

replies.body: Instead of saying "i am the darkness" or whatever his quote is, he could say "I am the party"
